projects.title: Break Alert
projects.bodyText:
- A Chrome extension toolkit containing a scheduler, to-do list, and improved bookmark system, to improve users' productivity and time management.
 -  Identified application's functionalities and designed frontend UI for each took using **JavaScript** and **HTML**.
 - Implemented the scheduler system and integrated other modules into the toolkit

projects.title: Loafing Time
projects.bodyText:
- A relaxing game that simulates a real-world scenario for users to release anxiety after daily hardworking.
 - Designed game scenes and pixel characters using **Pixel Studio** and polished charactersâ€™ effect and animations in **Procreate**.
 - Constructed BGMs using **GarageBand**.
 - Implemented game functionalities and frontend UI using **Phasor 3**, **JavaScript** and **HTML**.

projects.title: Upside Down
projects.bodyText:
- A gravity-reversed game for users to jump between two zones to pass each level with rewards.
 - Implemented game interactions using **JavaScript** and **TypeScript** and created Game UI using **crisp-game-lib**.
 - Option to put on Vibrate instead of Silent.

projects.title: One Touch RPG
projects.bodyText:
- An RPG game involving actions including slashing, stabbing, and guarding for users to enjoy level-based adventures.
 - Identified game scenes, components, interaction, and bonus rules using **UML**; adopted rapid and mechanic-focused prototyping strategy to implement functionalities using **JavaScript** (**crisp-game-lib**) and **TypeScrip**.

projects.title: RarioWare - Bubble Fly
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads list of feeds from a **paginated** API and shows in a RecyclerView.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
